CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 28, 1956, pg. 16, reads: "Bachelor Takes Wife - Howard Hairston and his bride, the former Madelyn Moorer Cole, are the picture of happiness as they pose for the photographer following their wedding at St. James AME Church. - Teenie Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Groom Howard Hairston kissing bride Madelyn Moorer Cole Hairston, in front of minister in St. James AME Church
